Credits and Support
===================

Authors
-------

Wheelwright was written by `Kris Andersen <mailto:kris@biciworks.com>`_.

Support
-------

Wheelwright is a small project. If you need help, just `email me
<mailto:kris@biciworks.com>`_. You'll make my day. If more than 5
people ever email me, maybe I'll create a Google Group.
